General.Name: Jiangsu Lanfeng Bio-chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Lanfeng Bio-chemical Co.,Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells pesticides, fungicides, insecticides, herbicides, and fine chemical intermediates in China and internationally. It offers carbendazim, thiophanate-methyl, cycloazinone, carbosulfan butyl, sulfuric acid, and surfactant. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Xinyi, China.
